Product - Class in BusinessLayer
The Product class represents a product.

Constructs an empty Product.

Constructs a new Product with the specified ID.

ProductDAO - Class in DBLayer
The ProductDAO class provides data access methods for handling products and related operations in the database.
ProductDAO() - Constructor for class DBLayer.ProductDAO
Default constructor for creating a ProductDAO instance with its own database connection.
ProductDAO(Connection) - Constructor for class DBLayer.ProductDAO
Constructor for creating a ProductDAO instance with a provided database connection.
productExists(int) - Method in class BusinessLayer.Product
Checks whether a product with the specified ID exists in the database.
productExists(int) - Method in class DBLayer.ProductDAO
Checks if a product with the given ID exists in the database.
productReport - Class in UILayer
The productReport class represents a JFrame for displaying bar charts of product expiration dates.
